SHOPITEM.PRODUCTNAME: The Battles of Tolkien - David Day
SHOPITEM.PRODUCT: The Battles of Tolkien - David Day
SHOPITEM.DESCRIPTION: Tolkien's works are punctuated by dramatic and explosive battles. Men versus Orcs, Elves versus Sauron, Goblins versus Dwarves - the history of Middle-earth has seen some of the greatest characters pitted against each other time and time again
